descriptions.title: Required skills
paragraphs: At least 3+ years of experience designing user interfaces for web & mobile applications
Expertise in Adobe products, InVision or other wireframe & prototyping tool
Expertise in building User Experience as a whole
Passion for elegant and intuitive user interfaces with ability to balance different points of view
Understanding of modern web technologies & platforms: Single Page Web Applications, Android, iOS
Effective verbal and written communication skills are a must as you will work in a team environment

descriptions.title: As a plus
paragraphs: Experience with AGILE methodologies is a plus working with other teams via JIRA.

descriptions.title: We offer
paragraphs: Five-day work-week within young and energetic team
Paid vacation — 20 working days per year
Large international projects
Flexible working schedule
Competitive salary, yearly reviewed, possibilities of growth

descriptions.title: Responsibilities
paragraphs: Assess functional requirements while understanding the business needs & customer expectations
Produce user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and final design in Photoshop as deliverables for the technology team for all platforms
Analyze user interface problems and create on-brand design solutions that bridge user and business goals
Conduct user experience research to improve existing and new applications
